figure_1: Distribution of Altmetric attention score across all journals. Figure demonstrates right skewed Altmetric Attention Score distribution.
figure_2: Scatter plot demonstrating correlation between Altmetric attention score and number of citations across all journals. Line represents line of best fit.
figure_3: Scatter plot demonstrating correlation between Altmetric attention score and number of citations of each individual journal. Line represents line of best fit.
figure_4: (A) Scatter plot demonstrating correlation between Altmetric attention score and twitter activity, (B) Scatter plot demonstrating correlation between number of citations and twitter activity.
